title: Love and Werewolves
description: Alanna, a vampire, has lived on her own in a cabin in the woods for 150 years. She prefers her solitude. One day an injured werewolf, Valko, lands on her doorstep. As she nurses him back to health she finds herself falling in love. But there are forces out there working against them, and secrets that could tear their world apartâ€¦
author: Cate Farren
